title: How to Install Super Bluetooth Hack on Android

steps.title: Understand what Super Bluetooth Hack allows you to do.
steps.content: Understand what Super Bluetooth Hack allows you to do. In theory, Super Bluetooth Hack should allow you to view the files and other information from a Bluetooth-connected phone. You may also be able to edit or remove files and folders depending on the connected phone. If you don't have the ability to connect your Android to the phone you want to hack, you won't be able to use Super Bluetooth Hack.

steps.title: Know which phones you can "hack".
steps.content: Know which phones you can "hack". Unfortunately, you can only use Super Bluetooth Hack with Android phones. You cannot use this app to view files on an iPhone, Windows Phone, or any kind of computer. You may be able to use Super Bluetooth Hack to access an Android tablet.

steps.title: Turn on your Android's Bluetooth.
steps.content: Turn on your Android's Bluetooth. Swipe down from the top of the screen to bring down the Notification menu, then tap the "Bluetooth" icon in the resulting drop-down. If the "Bluetooth" icon is highlighted or blue, it's already on. You may have to turn on Bluetooth for the other phone as well.

steps.title: Connect to the phone you want to hack.
steps.content: Connect to the phone you want to hack. Select the other phone's name in the Bluetooth menu, then enter a PIN that displays on the other phone's screen if prompted. Once your phones are connected via Bluetooth, you can proceed.

steps.title: Open Google Chrome.
steps.content: Open Google Chrome. Tap the Chrome app icon, which resembles a red, yellow, green, and blue ball.

steps.title: Open the Super Bluetooth Hack download site.
steps.content: Open the Super Bluetooth Hack download site. Go to http://www.thomas.hoornstra.org/hack/ in the Chrome browser.

steps.title: Select the download link.
steps.content: Select the download link. Tap Super Bluetooth Hack v. 1.08 near the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap OK when prompted.
steps.content: Tap OK when prompted. Doing so allows the Super Bluetooth Hack file to download into your Android's "Download" folder.

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store.
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store. Tap the Play Store app icon, which resembles a multicolored triangle on a white background.

steps.title: Tap the search bar.
steps.content: Tap the search bar. It's at the top of the screen. Your Android's on-screen keyboard will appear.

steps.title: Search for the J2ME Loader app.
steps.content: Search for the J2ME Loader app. Type in j2me loader to do so. You should see a drop-down menu with matching results appear.

steps.title: Tap J2ME Loader.
steps.content: Tap J2ME Loader . It's in the drop-down list of matching results.

steps.title: Tap INSTALL.
steps.content: Tap INSTALL . This green button is in the upper-right corner of the screen. J2ME Loader will begin installing onto your Android.

steps.title: Open J2ME Loader.
steps.content: Open J2ME Loader. Tap OPEN in the Google Play Store when prompted, or tap the purple J2ME Loader app icon in your Android's App Drawer.

steps.title: Tap ALLOW when prompted.
steps.content: Tap ALLOW when prompted. Doing so allows J2ME Loader to access your Android's files, which is necessary in order to load the Super Bluetooth Hack app.

steps.title: Tap the "New" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "New" icon. It's an orange-and-white ＋ icon in the bottom-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Download.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Download . This folder is in the "D" section of the menu. The folder will open.

steps.title: Select the Super Bluetooth Hack file.
steps.content: Select the Super Bluetooth Hack file. Find and tap SuperBluetoothHack_v108.jar in the "Download" folder to do so. This will open the Super Bluetooth Hack file in J2ME Loader. It may take a few minutes for the file to open in J2ME Loader.

steps.title: Tap 'BT INFO.
steps.content: Tap 'BT INFO . It's at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap START.
steps.content: Tap START . You'll see this in the top-right corner of the screen. Doing so opens the Super Bluetooth Hack configuration page, from which point you can begin configuring Super Bluetooth Hack.

steps.title: Tap the "Jazyk" drop-down icon .
steps.content: Tap the "Jazyk" drop-down icon . It's in the middle of the menu. This prompts a drop-down menu. "Jazyk" is Slovak for "Language".

steps.title: Tap English.
steps.content: Tap English . This option is in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . It's in the top-right corner of the screen. Another drop-down menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap Spät'.
steps.content: Tap Spät' . This option is in the drop-down menu. Doing so takes you back to the main Super Bluetooth Hack menu. At this point, the menu item names will all switch to English, and you can proceed with connecting to another Android. "Spät" is Slovak for "Back".

steps.title: Tap Connect.
steps.content: Tap Connect . This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap From List.
steps.content: Tap From List . It's near the top of the page. This brings up a list of connected Bluetooth phones.

steps.title: Select the phone to which you're connected.
steps.content: Select the phone to which you're connected. Tap the name of the phone in the list to do so. Super Bluetooth Hack will attempt to connect to the phone.

steps.title: Enter a PIN if prompted.
steps.content: Enter a PIN if prompted. You may be asked to input a four-digit number to confirm the pairing; this number will display on the connected Android. In many cases, this PIN is "0000".

steps.title: Follow any on-screen prompts.
steps.content: Follow any on-screen prompts. Once you're connected to the phone via Super Bluetooth Hack, you may be able to browse the phone's files or see call logs; this will largely depend on the phone to which you're connected, so follow any on-screen prompts or menu items to see the full extent of what you can do with Super Bluetooth Hack. In some cases, you may not be able to do anything with the connected phone even after connecting through Super Bluetooth Hack.
